testcase.name: Rest api e2e TestCase 1
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts" .................... passed And header Content-Type = "application/json; charset=UTF-8" ............... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * def id = 1 .............................................................. passed * print id ................................................................ passed Given url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/" + id .............. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Given url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/" + id .............. passed And header Content-Type = "application/json; charset=UTF-8" ............... passed And request "{id: " + id + ", title: 'foo', body: 'bar', userId: 1}" ...... passed When method put ........................................................... passed Given url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/" + id .............. passed When method delete ........................................................ passed
